title: Living as If Jesus Rose from the Dead
description:
Rough Draft to Sunday on Luke 24. 

And you get a great illustration of meek with Mabel from John Ortberg's "The Life You've Always Wanted" https://paulvanderklay.me/2009/10/03/mabel/

Final Draft https://youtu.be/pxyA18T-vRg
